Neuropathology Status

Source: R/data.R
NPSTATUS.Rd

Neuropathology Status data. More information is available at https://adni.loni.usc.edu/data-samples/adni-data/

Usage

data(NPSTATUS)

Format

A data frame with 10952 observations and 23 variables.

Source

https://adni.loni.usc.edu/data-samples/adni-data/

Details

  • ORIGPROT character Original study protocol , with options: ADNI1, ADNI2, ADNIGO, ADNI3, ADNI4

  • COLPROT factor Study protocol of data collection , with factor levels: ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2, ADNI3, ADNI4

  • PTID character Participant ID

  • RID numeric Participant roster ID Range value: 2, ..., 10669

  • VISCODE character Visit code

  • VISCODE2 character Translated visit code

  • VISDATE Assessment NPSDATE when present; otherwise Registry EXAMDATE Date: YYY-MM-DD

  • NPDECIDE character Has a definitive decision about brain donation been made?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPDEC character If a decision has been made, has the participant agreed to register for brain donation?

    • ADNI2: 1=No - provide reason for nonparticipation; 2=Yes - signed provisional consent form on file; 3=Yes - consent form being reviewed; 4=Yes - consent form to be completed at time of autopsy; 5=Other

    • ADNI3: 1=No - provide reason for nonparticipation;2=Yes - signed provisional consent form on file;3=Yes - consent form being reviewed;4=Yes - consent form to be completed at time of autopsy;5=Other

    • ADNI4: 1=No – provide reason for nonregistration; 2=Yes – signed registration form on file; 3=Yes – registration form being reviewed; 4=Yes – registration form to be completed at time of autopsy

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPDECNO character If No, select reason(s) for nonregistration.

    • ADNI2

    • ADNI3: 1=Not interested, personal choice, or not comfortable.;2=Family does not want autopsy, participant does not want to burden family after death;3=Religious or other beliefs;4=Wants body buried/cremated intact, does not want body altered after death;99=Other (specify)

    • ADNI4: 1=Not interested, personal choice, or not comfortable.; 2=Family does not want autopsy, participant does not want to burden family after death; 3=Religious or other beliefs; 4=Wants body buried/cremated intact, does not want body altered after death; 99=Other (specify)

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPDECCF character If there is agreement to register, is the agreement for autopsy for a study other than ADNI?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPUNDEC character If participant is undecided, have they been given information (brochure, discussion with clinician) regarding autopsy/brain donation?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPCONS character Was registration for brain donation discussed at this visit?

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPCONSNO character If no, why not:

    • ADNI3: 1=Site error;2=Previous definitive no response from participant;3=Site not participating in brain donation;99=Other reason(s)

    • ADNI4: 1=Site error; 2=Previous definitive "no" response from participant; 3=Site not participating in brain donation (prior approval from ADNI leadership required); 99=Other reason(s)

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPSOURC character Information source

    • ADNI3: 1=Participant visit;2=Telephone call

    • ADNI4: 1=Participant visit; 2=Telephone call

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • ID numeric Record ID Range value: 13, ..., 186263

  • SITEID numeric Site ID Range value: 1, ..., 941

  • USERDATE User Create Date Date: YYY-MM-DD

  • USERDATE2 User Last Modify Date Date: YYY-MM-DD

  • DD_CRF_VERSION_LABEL character CRF Version Label , with options: v1, v2

  • LANGUAGE_CODE character Language Code e=English Decoded Value: Yes

  • HAS_QC_ERROR character Has Quality Check Error 0=Does not have QC error or QC error has been approved; 1=Has QC error Decoded Value: Yes

  • update_stamp POSIXct: YYY-MM-DD

Author

adni-data@googlegroups.com
